<<<<<<< HEAD
The blessednesse of a sound spirit: vvith the misery of a vvounded spirit VVhere first a sound spirit is described and differenced, and lets discouered, helpes prescribed. By Robert Harris. Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.
[2], 29, [1] p.
Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for I. Bartlet, and are to be sold at his shop in Cheap-side, at the signe of the gilded Cup, London : 1628.
Identification of printer from STC. Also issued as part of Harris's "Six sermons never heretofore published". Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
=======
